clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.Depr.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.DeprecatedOrUnsafeBufferHandling
Warn on uses of unsecure or deprecated buffer manipulating functions.
The
clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.DeprecatedOrUnsafeBufferHandling
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.Depr.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
